price: 64. Verily, it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-fire,
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
